title: Room Key Script
content:

author: jharrison

comments.content:
Sorry, you're right, my answer was not complete. Actually I found the exact one but this freebie was blatantly close to Refreshment Stand, I took the conclusion to consider it as an illegal rip-off. That's why I decided to silence the match name and to credit Refreshment Stand for being the source of your sample.  
Top the rip-off freebie, bottom Refreshment Stand with main difference for your sample is /o-/m connection.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141005160422im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_3961.png)
Well, actually it looks like the freebie predates the Fontdiner offering. And it cites its source as "Traced from the Dover book: Brushstroke and Free-Style Alphabets-100 Complete Fonts".

Ok, ok, guys... Pleading guilty now :D  
 [Halo Handletter](http://web.archive.org/web/20141005160422/http:/www.dafont.com/halohandletter.font) by Mario Arturo is the one I found.
